column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The dishes that I did not love were the seared sausages and chicken and sausage. The sausages were too fatty for my liking
column2: and the chicken and sausage dish came with the same sausage as the seared sausage dish so not worth getting both! However
column3: there's plenty more options on the menu to try! Looking forward to trying the paella and one-bites (pinxtos) next time.
